Name: Forceful
Description: Increased knockback range and force on hit

Name: Destructive
Description: Greatly deal extra damage to environment

Name: Speedy
Description: Increased movement speed while weapon is equipped

Name: Powerful
Description: Increased damage dealt

Name: Rapid
Description: Increased reloading speed

Name: X-Mag
Description: Larger ammo magazine size

Name: Optical
Description: Increased vision range

Name: Ample
Description: Reload more than one ammo at a time

Name: Expanding
Description: Increased area damage and radius

Name: Stunning
Description: Immobilize target on first shot of clip

Name: Blazing
Description: Adds fire based damage over time

Name: Cryo
Description: Adds a slow effect, subsequent shots reset the slow

Name: Corrosive
Description: Adds poison based damage over time

Name: Shielding
Description: Gain missing shield on hit

Name: Healing
Description: Heal missing health on hit

Name: BigShielding
Description: Gain missing shield on hit

Name: BigHealing
Description: Heal missing health on hit

Name: Critical
Description: Chance to deal 150% more damage on hit

Name: Frenzied
Description: Increased firing rate and reloading speed

Name: BigFrenzied
Description: Increased firing rate and reloading speed

Name: Relentless
Description: Firing penalty decreased and increased movement speed

Name: Double Tap
Description: Deal double damage, consumes more ammo, and slower bullet speed

Name: Thirsty
Description: Eliminating players grant more damage
